about_the_game:
A wise man once said, “If your only goal is to become rich, you will never achieve it without solving a few cases.” Or something like that. 

Grab a freshly brewed coffee (never instant!), feed your pet bird, wrap yourself in a cozy blanket, and set out for a tour of the city where you're at home everywhere, and every inconspicuous citizen napping on a bench is your neighbor. Prove your worth to those who've doubted you—and most importantly, yourself. Uncover the secrets scattered around and solve the mysterious case of the Golden Spoon.

FEATURES

  • Inspired by both classic point-and-click and modern narrative adventure games.

  • Puzzles that accept your uniqueness and creative thinking.

  • Freedom of choice is sometimes met with consequences.

  • Embrace the role of a detective with eavesdropping mechanics and a visual clue system.

Supported using public funding by Slovak Arts Council

name: Grayton the Detective

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Grayton the Detective is a narrative adventure game about a homeless man who once lived in wealth and comfort, now showers with a kettle, and solves petty mysteries on the streets of Cleveland. However, with the disappearance of mysterious Golden Spoon, everything may change.
